title: Tales from a Not-So-Glam TV Star
description:
It’s 
Diary of a Wimpy Kid 
for girls in this hilarious novel!Everyone’s been rooting for me and my crush, Brandon—and now I can FINALLY write all about what did – or didn’t – happen with our first kiss! Sighhhhh. There’s a LOT happening right now! A reality TV crew is following me and my friends as we record our hit song together, plus there are voice lessons, dance practice, and my little sister Brianna’s latest wacky hijinks (they NEVER end). I’m sure I’ve got this…but I hope all of this excitement won’t cause new problems for me and Brandon…eek!!The Dork Diaries series has more than 13 million copies in print worldwide!
author: Rachel Renée Russell
